name: REPLAY
description:
In an abandoned underground facility, deadly clones are following your every move.

If you stop, they will kill you.

If you are careless, you will kill yourself.

Can you escape the clones?

  • Thrilling first person action game in which your actions are reflected in the movements of your enemies.
  • Explore grungy and tense environments, including a dilapidated warehouse and a mysterious mine.
  • Uncover the strange technological remnants of EMET Industries.
  • Unlock New Game+ for a serious challenge.
